org.openfaces.validation.core
Class FacesMessages

java.lang.Object
  org.openfaces.validation.core.FacesMessages
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FacesMessages
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

FacesMessages

is a utility class that is used to creating FacesMessage instances and adding them to FacesContext

See Also:
Serialized Form
